{{Actor| | type = Gore | name = Medical tank with hearts | class = HeartsInTank | game = Strife | doomednum = 113 | convid = 228 }}[[Classes]]: HeartsInTank
A medical tank filled with liquid, containing several human hearts. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR HeartsInTank { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 56 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: HERT ABC 4 Bright Loop } }
